nithiyata pitasthara ghathana, balahathkarayen athurudan kirim pilibandawa pathiri athi chodana wishwasaniya lesin parikshawata lakkirima, shi්ra lankawe uthura nirmilitarikaranaya kirima, apakshapathi idam gatalu wisandime yantha්ranayak athikirima, randawa ganime pa්rathipaththi pilibandawa nawatha salaka balima, pera pawathi swadhina siwil aayathana sthapitha kirima, palath sandaha balaya wimadhyagatha kirimata deshapalana wisandumakata eema, siyalu janathawage bhashanaye nidahasa aaraksha kirima saha ihala nanwima, nithiye palanaya athikirimata nithi ki්rayathmaka kirima yana komisame sadhaniya yojana sihiyata nagamu.

eeta wada wara gananak narambauwoth eeke wiwechanaya liyanna ma jiwath wana ekak na.prashnaya - sinhala chithrapatayak adhyakshanaya kirimata thibiya yuthu sudusukam monawada?pilithura – chithrapataye wadabhara ganna giwisume mapata angillen hari athsana gahanna puluwan nam ee oona tharam athi.prashnaya – chithrapatayakata githayen wana sewaya kumakda?pilithura – winadi thuna hatharakin chithrapataya dikwima.prashnaya – lankawe naluniliyan thula thibena boru uddhachcha manaya batahira nalu niliyan thula naththe ayi?pilithura - koyi rateth naluniliyangen wadidena puhu manaya hithata gath aya thama.
